metadata.title: CVE-2023-36377 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
Buffer Overflow vulnerability in mtrojnar osslsigncode v.2.3 and before allows a local attacker to execute arbitrary code via a crafted .exe, .sys, and .dll files.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-36377` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

osslsigncode - 2.3.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: osslsigncode package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.3.0-1').
